oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Riverside Drive Church of Christ, 2001 May 25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Riverside Drive Church of Christ located at 1530 Riverside Drive in Nashville, Tennessee. This Christian congregation was founded in 1937 and construction on the church building began that same year. Building was delayed due to wartime and scarcity of supplies. It was not until 1950 that construction was actually finished. In the ensuing years several additions to the building were made. The foundation is made of grey rough cut stone blocks with finished grey stone capping before the start of the brick exterior walls. The roof is flat. The windows are large and square featuring colored glass panes. The doors are made of wood. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Riverside Drive Church of Christ (Nashville, Tenn.)
